review: I love oatley oat milk but this yogurt is nasty!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2021
name: MDAnderson
title: I Love This Yogurt
review: The negative reviews really surprise me. This yogurt is definitely one of the closest tastingto real yogurt that I have tried. Frankly, it’s better than the coconut yogurt, and almond yogurt alternatives. The first note is slight chalky, but then it is smooth, and rich, and quite delicious. Also love the fruit on the bottom feature (which is missing from most alternative yogurts).

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2021
name: Amazon Customer
title: Meh
review: Was very sticky texture and flavor was weird. I rather drink the oatly milk...

review: Super runny. Flavor was not good at all. This has to be the worst dairy alternative yogurt I have ever had.

review: I love oatly milk and was super excited to try this. Very disappointed and don’t like the taste or consistency. Kite hill yogurt is much better.

review: Es un sabor diferente pero muy bueno

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2020
name: Sarah
title: Delicious!
review: One of the best vegan alternatives I’ve found. Creamy and the perfect texture and the strawberry is not overpowering. Not watery and bland like other brands, and the price is a steal!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2021
name: Eric Grady
title: Pasty
review: This taste like flavored white paste. I tossed it in the trash after the first spoon-full.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2021
name: Ms. Bee
title: Kids love it
review: It's a favorite snack for my kids! And I'm happy knowing they get to have healthy,tastey snacks without dairy.But for me personally, I think it's ok. It's a bit too sweet for me. I prefer a more subtle taste for my yogurt.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2021
name: Shaina
title: Great taste!
review: Great taste, a perfect healthy snack, and I love that it's vegan!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
name: Kelly
title: A whiff of strawberry...
review: Okay, so first the good: The texture is spot on to your typical dairy-based yogurt; it is creamy, and thick (stir it up when you get it) with little specks of fruit in it that are delightful. The not-so-good: It's a very, very light taste. Almost like, a faint whiff of strawberry, so that the oat taste really penetrates through and overpowers it for me. Don't get me wrong, I'm not looking for over the top artificial strawberry-ness in my yogurt, but I do think this product would be greatly improved if the strawberry flavor was amped up a bit. Right now, it reminds me of the taste of strawberry bubble gum that you've already chewed for an hour. All that being said, the texture is super promising. It definitely could benefit from being jazzed up with some fresh fruit, nuts, granola...but on its own, its just not jiving for me.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2021
name: cerulean
title: oat my god, so good
review: I'm lowkey obsessed with this oatgurt now. Very light flavor, almost reminiscent of bubble gum but in a good way. Only downside is there isn't a ton of protein but add some nuts or mix to it and you're good to go!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2021
name: Famous
title: Gooey but still good
review: Good but a bit runny or gooey.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2021

title: Tastes, smells, and looks like shampoo
review: I was excited to try oatly’s yogurt.But, unfortunately, it’s really really bad.I took one taste and threw it out.A blog I saw had taste-tested it and compared it to shampoo… I think that’s the most accurate comparison. It’s awful. Really. Skip it.
